name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Appellant, v. Vivian O. FARRINGTON, Ronald J. Farrington, Bruce J. Farrington, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth, Department of Transportation v. Farrington

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
FLAHERTY, J., took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Appellant, v. Vivian O. FARRINGTON, Ronald J. Farrington, Bruce J. Farrington, Appellees.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed, 35 Pa.Cmwlth. 373, 387 A.2d 136.
FLAHERTY, J., took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Edward D. Werblun, Martin Burman, Asst. Attys. Gen., for appellant.
Gregory J. Dean, King of Prussia, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
414 A.2d 128
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Appellant, v. Vivian O. FARRINGTON, Ronald J. Farrington, Bruce J. Farrington, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 22, 1980.
Decided May 16, 1980.
Edward D. Werblun, Martin Burman, Asst. Attys. Gen., for appellant.
Gregory J. Dean, King of Prussia, for appellees.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
